My husband loves these shoes, and they look great!  They do run about a half size small, so I'd recommend trying some on before ordering

These Women's Winter White Short Rubber Waterproof Rain Boots are great. They're really cute, comfy (slight heel slippage but that's probably an issue with the shape of my feet), and don't look cheap. However, they aren't white as described or shown in the picture. They're definitely a creamy off white color. Luckily I like that better than pure white but some people expecting bright white might be disappointed.

I hadn't been skiing in over 15 years, so I didn't want to spend too much money outfitting myself for a weekend trip.  I definitely got my $'s worth with this purchase--it was great!  The versatility is nice (it was a fairly warm day, which made being able to wear the jacket w/o the fleece perfect!).  The only drawback for me is the hard edge of the hood visor (which I imagine might be quite practical)--when stored in the collar, it's a bit uncomfortable

I love my new jacket. It is so warm and totally wind proof. The fleece itself is very warm and it's awesome that you can wear the fleece and the shell in combinations. looks sharp, fits well, good buy

These boots are the best 3rd birthday dress-up fireman boots ever.  My 3 year old loves them.  I'm sure they are great rain boots, as well, but we live in a dry climate.  The boots came with a few little mars on the stripes...  didn't have time to exchange them or I would have.
My son got these for his birthday in Feb and he wears them everywhere, school, store, outside and they are holding up very well.  Thanks so much

Great product and fast shipping.  Only trouble is the size.  I found the chart hard to read and when they arrived they seamed to run big!  BUT, I have to say they seem like they are sturdy boots and will last!  MY SON LOVES THEM!

Which is the reason that I got these boots for my friend's son. He has a fireman's costume and the boots were necessary to complete the "set". He loves them! The boots are sturdy and attractive and could be used as functional boots if necessary! Great item

These are great raincoats and the children who received them - absolutely love them.  I recommend them to without hesitation.  A word to the wise I did not buy a fireman's helmet (did do the boots) and my Grandson really did expect to see a helmet

I was very pleased with this item. I also purchased the raincoat and hat to match. I purchased these items for my grandson for Christmas and he immediately put them on. The items shipped ahead of the expected date and I was really happy that I did not have to worry about having them for Christmas
I tore my plantar facia a couple of years a go and have worn Clarks ever since. I like these shoes because they are comfortable but still look good.

I needed these tap shoes quickly and couldnt afford to spend too much money. I got them within the week and payed a lot less than i had expected to pay. I reccomend discount dance as well as all purchases through Amazon.

These shoes work well, but are very uncomfortable.  I wouldn't recommend them if you have to wear them for more than 15 or 20 minutes.  I use them to practice with my daughter; they work fine for that

I've been searching all over for a black sock to wear with dress loafers. I've worn pantyhose with the shoes but frankly socks are more comfortable. DKNY used to make a good sock for this purpose but they discontinued it. I don't like 'knee highs' or bulky fabric or a sock that is constricting at the top (bad for circulation). This sock is perfect! It's soft and resiliant and the height is just right (a bit below mid-calf). I feel like I could dance on air!
Keeps you nice and warm in cold weather  Wore it in 58 inches of snow  and it worked great would recomend this to anyone who lives in cold areas nice neck warmer als

I wear these shoes all the time because they go with everything!  The only problem is that I go through them so quickly!  I often run a hole through the sole and they don't always stay buckled (so sometimes I safety pin them--classy!).  But I still love these shoes

love the bowling shoes . . .they definitely stand out in a crowd.  gee, they might even make me bowl better! teehee . . . they are a little stiff, and hope they soften up . . . but all in all . . .LOVE THEM!!
I am delighted with this bag.  It's the perfect size, and has numerous pockets and zipper compartments.  The leather is soft and pliable.  Highly recommended

These boots are great.  They are very warm, no more freezing feet when walking in snow!  True to size, maybe a bit larger than normal.  I ordered my normal size and still have plenty of room even with thick wool socks
Look sharp at the gym. Kind of squeeky when wet. I throw them in the washing machine to clean them. I liked them enough to give a pair away as a gift ...j.g. Staten Island, N

The order was smooth, the item was shipped out promptly and recieved much earlier than expected. However the most striking thing was that I found a hole in the inseam after one washing, I reported it (a month later!) and they sent me a new pair no questions, no charge. I need to note that such a hole is just my bad luck, it is in no way common with this company.I love this company and as I have already told them, I will look here first the next time I need to purchase anything
It's so hard to find seam stockings, and these were a great pair. They were exactly what I was looking for. There sexy and perfect for the night out, or with a trendy suit

I don't quite understand why backseam pantyhose and nylon stockings are not more popular with females. Backseam pantyhose are not especially easy to find, but the allure of a backseam in pantyhose or nylon stockings is very sexy.    I enjoy wearing this Hue Black Sheer Backseam pantyhose, as it is comfortable, sensual and sexy. Keep in mind though this pantyhose has a control top that is not sheer. Therefore it would be best not to wear this pantyhose with quite short minidresses and mini-skirts.    I would like to see more backseam pantyhose offered, especially in beige.

I am now able to use my laptop (Dell Inspiron 8200 - HOT) for a few hours without sweating or feeling any heat.  The laptop stays cooler than actually being on my lap.  My lap desk also came with a sticker indicating which side the laptop is supposed to lie on.  The laptop surface is hard and is covered in thin sturdy fabrics while the lap surface is cushioned. I frequently use my laptop on my lap with my knees bent up so the non slip surfaces (partial on top an full on bottom) make it convenient to do so.

Unlike the prior reviewer, mine came with a sticker instructing me to put the laptop on the rigid surface with the soft surface sitting on my legs.   It works great!   No problems with my laptop getting hot, and I an actually sit with it on my legs for a couple of hours without feeling any heat.   The only caveat is that it's a bit bulky to travel with (great for home).  I purchased one of their Chinooks, which rolls up, for flying, and am extremely happy with it also
I was looking for a compass to put on my daughters bike and bought a couple of these.  It does not work very well wether it is on the bike or away from the bike

Helps make my son remember to practice.  Quick, light, easy to move around.  Love how it is collapsable. Much easier to "commit" to from a space perspective than the big hockey goal, big "pitchback" thing, big basketball set-up, and other sports materials that have taken over our garage which cannot be dis-assembled when not being used.  Plus I think the smaller size of these goals is a plus in working on accuracy in aim in kicking goals or passing.  I highly recommend this, and it made a great birthday present when combined with a few toys.

All things Japanese seems to be big right now.  Being a huge fan of the Japanese culture, I like this.  These shoes are comfortable and stylish.  Flats with an ankle wrap and your very own Guardian Dragon.  They can be dressed up, down and anywhere in between.  The fit was perfect
I've had it for 8 months now, only problem is that the lace below the hooks is starting to tear.  I think they will prolly be trash after a year, but they have been great for now

I purchased this bra through Birth and Baby when my son was a couple months old. As I knew that Goddess bras are sized differently from most other bras I was in contact with the owner and got tons of wonderful help picking the right size for me. Her advice for sizes was perfect! At that time I was an I cup in most bras and she was a great help in getting me in an H cup in the Goddess bra. I usually hate to wear bras as they dig in everywhere and are just plain uncomfortable. This one I could wear all day and still leave it on when I get home. After loosing weight I'm now looking to purchase new bras and I will be getting more Goddess bras. Even after my son weans I will be looking in to Goddess bras they have made a life long customer with their excellent bras.

This is a wonderful bra. Yes it does run in a larger size but if you get your fit right its the best bra you could own. I have a very large chest and i have never found as good of support as this bra gives me. I would diffently buy this bra again and again and again

If you are full figured and looking for a good nursing bra, I HIGHLY recommend the Goddess Cotton Soft Cup Nursing Bra 511. It has great support, and has a secure clasp that is also quick to open. Its all I wear now after trying several styles and brands
According to the write up a 46 inch belt should comfortably fit a 48 inch waist.  This is not the case.    Apart from that an attractive belt

These boots are both comfortable and provide good ankle support. Unlike some boots with toe protection, the toes are not cramped by the toe cap. Side zip allows the wearer to put the boots on quickly, while laces permit adjustment when needed. Good looking boot, and with pants-over can be worn to town. Very lightweight, but appears to be solid Converse qualit
Very nice shirts, thin but firm, provide ample space for your neck and don't strangle the throat. Very happy with them. A little pricey though

This is truly the first shapewear product that I can comfortably wear all day and not feel like I have to rip it off the moment I get home.  The material is soft not rubbery like other products.  It fits like a second skin but it's breathable.  It feels snug where you need to be like in the tummy area and relaxed where you want it to be like in the waist and crotch areas.  I'm hooked
Great jacket and easy to order on line and received before Christmas. You are great ,, Amazon.  All my purchases were great.  Jacket was exactly what we ordered, right size, color,etc.,  Thank yo

Great reissue by Reebok of a shoe immensely popular in the early 1990's.  It would be nice to see this trend of recreating classic styles from the past continue forward.  The 4600 High could come back in more color schemes, with some colors vintage and some others contemporary.  Perhaps more "real" hi-tops could be brought back by Reebok and other companies as well.
Soft and comfy, lightweight t-shirt. The only problem is that the neck does seem to get stretched out more eaisly, but perhaps that's just because it's a fairly thin t-shirt.

These boots seem to be very well made, and I have yet to slip on ice due to the super grippy soles.  Of course, they look awesome.However, I bought the smallest size that Demonia makes (6), and they are too big all around.  I'm generally a size 6, sometimes 5 1/2, but these feel closer to a 7 or 8 (I can't make my toes touch the end even if I try).  Also, the boots stay up because they are stiff, but they are also loose on my calves and ankles.  These are not designed for small and slender people

Some information I'd like to share with future customers:* Not a drawstring waist.  Not an elastic waist either.  The waist is the same type of stretch seam as the legs, so be mindful of which opening is which when putting this on!* Fully lined, front and back, with light skin-tone 100% polyester.  The shell is labeled as given in the product description: 78% nylon, 22% Lycra/elastane/spandex.* Because of the polyester lining, this isn't a competition (i.e. very stretchy, very tight) suit.  Go ahead and order your regular waist size, you'll get a recreational fit.  Remember, there is no drawstring or elastic in the waist, so be cautious about jumping a full size upward.  36" is a Large, but 34" you might go Medium instead.* Wears fine as active underwear, with no visible seams under running tights, and no discomfort during "dry" workouts in the gym or the great outdoors
this is my favorite swimsuit when i go to the beach all the girl check me out cause what im wearing is hot and sexy and the girls love it

I want this suit so much. I have the speedo brief that has 1 inch sides, but this suit is way better. I can't find it in any sporting goods stores, so I guess I am going to have to buy it off Amazon. Just think, if you buy this suit, you will be the only male with a thong swimsuit in the pool. I swim at  recreation center, I cant wai
These yoga pants are great for Spring. The "dye lot" matches the other items I've purchased from The Children's Place. True to size and comes in different colors.
This is the 4th pair of Rockports I have owned.  These are great.  This is the only pair of shoes I have been able to put on brand new and wear the entire day and not make my feet hurt
I had similar shoes to these before I bought these. Theses are my replacements. They fit perfect and were shipped out quickly. I have no complaints
It's almost impossible to find shoes that fit when you wear 11 1/2 narrow.But luckily I've discovered shoes without having to order from Macy's or Nordstrom's and at a reasonable price
I got these simply because they were on sale and I needed a new pair of casual kicks. These are awesome! Comfortable, excellent quality, all around a good investment for the 35 dollars I paid

These are great shoes for driving and around the house.  The only negatives are the soles are very slippery if wet on smooth surfaces and the width of the design stitching are obviously different between the two feet.  I love these shoes for driving and everyday around the house
I bought these shoes for my boyfriend for Christmas. He loves them. The leather isn't the best quality but they are stylish and comfortable and he wears them all the time. They look very nice

I bought a pair in black.  They fit perfectly and are soooo comfy.  The bottom of the shoe is zigzag so it flexes easily like you're not wearing shoes.  I gave it four stars cuz I had to cut off the tassel since it looks like worms hanging off your shoe (which was real easy) and the bottom of the shoe is not completely covered with rubber, part of it is suede so you can't wear it near water.  Otherwise very comfy and cute

I bought this pump in brown for my wedding. It matches perfectly with my brown and lilac dress. But it does runs small. I'm a true size 9 but ordered a size 9.5. And even the 9.5 fit a little snug on my feet at first but loosened up within 1/2 hour of having them on. They could be worn with jeans and a nice top as well.

I bought these slides from Adidas about a week ago and I absolutely love them.I usually wear Crocs because of their comfort level, but these slides are like walking on air.I guarantee you will not want to wear anything else
I am very pleased with this item.  I have not been able to find this brand of shorts in my shopping area.  The item described was as I expected and it arrived promply.  I would order this again

I've been wearing this shoe for several months now, and my only complaint is that it's a very wide shoe.  So wide, you'd think it was unisex sizing.  The problem is the footbed itself.  Even though you can cinch the upper and the shoe is secure on your foot, you can't cinch it up so your foot can't slide sideways inside it.  Otherwise, it's easy on/off, secure tread--never slipped on dock yet.  And it would be fine for women w/wide feet who would ordinarily buy a men's athletic shoe.  Also seems very durable

This purchase was a gift for my husband. He and I have owned Keens since the day they came on the market! WE LOVE THEM. This pair is his 3rd pair and he could not be more happy with them. They are the perfect shoe for everything from river hiking, to dry land hiking, to a day in the city, to a day at the park! They are comfortable and oh so reliable. Keen Newport H2's are a must for just about everyone! (can you tell I really dig these shoes, hehee

The shirt was the perfect gift for my father-in-law.  He loved it.  He is an old farmer who freezes all the time.  The shirt was a great gift. The product was in great condition and was the color and style I ordered.
It was a christmas gift for my 11 year old cousin who loves tiki.  he was so excited with the present and has wore it every day since
This is the first pair of boots of this type I've owned.  They're amazingly comfortable, look great, and have terrific traction.  We had a very snowy winter, and these saw me through.  Good buy!

First let me say that my order was delivered to me in no time.  I acutally had to return and order a size down, and received my new order in a couple of days.  These boots are very very warm and comfortable. They are great for the snow and ice.  They have great grippers on the bottom to help prevent you from falling. I've ordered two pair for below the price of one seen on other website.   Very happy with my purchase

I just received the boots last night.  I love them!  The fit is a bit snug(I ordered a 7.5 but have a slightly wide foot), but have plenty of room at the heel. I'll just wear medium weight socks.  There is a thin adjustable black top above the fur. Handy to keep the snow out but the photo doesn't show that. Great value for the money!

Fellas, beware if you buy these shoes for a girl because once she puts them on it is all over for you.  It was for me. They are much hotter than could ever be described here.  In fact they are too amazing to even be given a vocabulary.  Do yourself a favor and by your girl these shoes.  You will not regret it.  I know I didn't.  A girl can never ever had too many pairs of shoes, but if she had to own just one pair, I would pray to God it was these

I really like these boots- they're cute and good quality, and the heel isn't too high.  Unfortunately they're way too big on me.  I usually wear an 8 or 8.5, and there were no 8's available, so I ordered the 8.5.  They're too big and I'm returning them.  Otherwise I would've been very happy

The Playtex 18 Hour Original Comfort Strap bra is a classic amongst bras, especially for those of us who wear larger sizes.  This bra is both comfortable and uplifting.  It is nearly impossible to find bras in the size I require anywhere but online.  Ordering via Amazon was quick, easy, and my order arrived sooner than expected

This is the best bra I have ever bought.  Being a bigger size, its very hard to find the perfect bra because none of them ever seem to fit right or give much support. This bra fits perfectly and provides the support a full-figured woman needs.  I really recommend you try one of these, its well worth the money and its the only bra I will use from now  on.

This is probably one of the best bras I've owned.  I like the wider straps. They don't dig into my shoulders. The material is smooth enough to wear under most clothes if you don't wear anything that's too tight. My only complaint, and I have this problem with most bras, is that I don't think they can get by calling it an "18-hour" bra.  Every bra I wear, and I've experimented with different sizes, seems to eventually ride up in the back and sag in the front. It's like I either have to wear more than one or change half way through the day. For the price though, it is good
uno de los mejores pares de zapatos que he comprado en mi vida.  muy comodos a pesar de tener suela dura.  no pierden la forma y la linea es muy elegant

I've tried many different jocks out there, and always find the pouches to run really small and doesn't provide much breathing room for my package. I usually end up feeling smashed and confined. What I like about this jock is there is a little stretch to the pouch, so once I put my package in the pouch, I'm able to pull on the material and create more room. I would still prefer a little more room in the pouch, but it is better than most. What is great, are the straps. I like the way they wrap around your cheeks, rather than strap across. What I did not like was the rubber Jocko tag on the front side. I think it kind of cheapens the look
I ordered the Garrick in Black and Dune.  It is a cute sandal and it runs true to size but is wide.  I usually wear 8.5M but I had to return these because they were too wide.

These shoes are pretty comfortable, although they did leave a sore on my left foot, but perhaps it was just to get used to them.  The price was definitely right! Half of what I would have paid in the stores
Very nice shoe.  Husband loves that they are very well made and can be worn inside or outside.  He threw out his other pair when he got these.  Worth the money

My husband got these slippers for Christmas this year, and he loves them.  The leather body is very soft and the fuzzy interior feels nice and keeps his feet warm.  He likes that the soles are substantial enough to run the trash out to the curb or pick up the mail without slipping or having the chill seep through

Felt I finally deserved a decent pair. Have always worn those cheep $5.00 silppers and tried to save a buck. Finally gave in and purchased a good pair. They are super durable, soft, warm and so.... comfortable. Undoubtedly takes off that evening chill without a problem. Rubber soles so you can make that trip to the garage or mailbox, that's if you can get out of your easy chair. Somewhat high priced, but mine say "Hush Puppies" on the sole. I guess I paid for the name, but as they say..."You Get What You Pay For". Money well spent!
Was very pleased with the service. I had  a slight problem with the product  and it was addressed and taken care of immediately. Would certainly order from this company agai

Purchased it as a Christmas gift for a teenage nephew. He's typically a "Large". Bought him an XXL size, just to allow for shrinkage and lotsa washings. These are very nice shirts for bigger and/or taller guys. They fit well and look very classy. The necks are expandable with elastic built in, which is a very nice feature. These would get five stars, but one of them started to fray in the front. The others have worn well though, and for the bigger or taller guy are highly recommended
I love it.  Its light and felt like you're wearing a tennis shoe.  Very Comfortable.  This is the best shoe I ever puchased online

Look and feel great.  Fit my size 11 feet very well.  While many dress socks are too tight and uncomfortable, these seem to take the shape of your foot and cradle it.  Never thought I'd have much to say about socks, pro or con. Wish I'd known about these before I retired
Overall I rate the 2(x)ist Men's Cotton Sergeant's Tank five (5) stars. They fit well, and are very comfortable to be in. I recommend buying it

Versatile tank top and equally stylish for the gym or dress up.  Well constructed with quality fabric.  The reinforced shoulders give the square cut (g unit look) tank look without looking too similar.  I'm eager to try out the other colors and materials that this tank comes in

I went down to a size 8 in these, nice but they have polyester in them.Ruins the way they fit as you break them in......I prefer LEVI 515's BOOT CUT,  525 LEVI BOOT CUT, MY FAV'S CALVIN'S LOW BOOT CUT, THE BEST,  THEY ARE WORTH THE PRICE....All cotton, not polyester, and some spandex, THESE can bag in the butt, or you need a belt with them....This happens because of the polyeste
Delivery was prompt, fit is good and I like the shelf bra.  The fabric is quite thin and has already started to lose its elasticity, but for the price, I feel it was a good purchase

These are so cute. Soft, roomy and comfortable with a flexable sole.  Just be sure you're OK with incessant squeaking.  It's like living with Spongebob.  It's really cute to see them trying to "walk loud" or tip-toe without making any noise.  As an added bonus, these shoes are great for knowing where your kids are at all times

A great piece for the costume.  I added some braids, beads, and dreadlocks to make more identical, but the base is good.  Scarf color is lighter and more shiny than in the pics, but was dulled easily with light spray and magic marker graphics.  I couldn't have been Capt. Jack without it

We got these glasses for our two month old and they are certainly cool looking on our little cutie.  They are a little large for her, but still fit with the velcro on the adjustable band just barely connecting on her little head.  100% UV protection por los ojos es muy bueno

I brought these boots before I went to Michigan and I had them sent overnight just so I could wear them on my trip.  To be honest when I first got them they arrived at my mom's house and when I took them out of the box I was very very disappointed but my mom LUVED EM!!!  I dress really different anyway so it kinda blew my mind that she would LUV EM.  She convinced me to keep em and I did...and she also said how cold it is in Michigan and I would need them over there and trust me...I did.  I got alot of compliments from people in the airport and that boosted my liking of the boot a WHOLE on great and we get tons of compliments on them, too. :)  So cute
We bought these sunglasses for our 14 month old before a beach vacation.  They stayed on, unlike the last sunglasses we tried for him.  Thank goodness!  A quality product and they worked like a charm

I did a lot of research on what to buy for my son (now 11 months) and baby banz are the best you can buy.  They stay put and with only a little coaching, he leaves them on all the time now.  Wherever we go, people stop my and ask where I got these sunglasses that actually stay on. They are especially great in the pool!  Very stylish, too! Great investment, you won't be disappointed.

After trying several brands I purchased a pair of Noisebuster's more than 3 years ago and I have to say that they are still the best value headphone when you want to disconnect from the outer world in noisy places. I usually wear them at the office while working which allows me to listen to music at the same time at a good quality (I mean, connected to a computer music system, you get very decent sound).I also own a pair of Bose QuietComfort which I bought on a later date which work prety well too. The Bose are superior if you want to listen to music in a better quality system (I own a Harman Kardon equipment and Bose speakers), but all in all I consider the noisebusters of better value for what I paid and very very close to the Bose on reducing the external noise. In net, I am definitively purchasing a new Noisebuster pair to replace my first set which is already showing signs of aging and would recommend the NB to anybody
The price was perfect for a brand new cleat.  It wasn't shipped as fast as another competitor and was delayed by 1 day.  However, the price made up for the time of delivery

These shoers were for my daughter.  She loves them!  As long as she is happy with them, I am happy with them.  Adidas has done a great job with supplying kids shoes for athletics.  That is the only kind of shoe, we as a family will wear.  Keep up the great work Adidas
Due to my weight and the fact I'm constantly on my feet shoes are critical.  I find these to give me total support while alowing my feet to feel free
I own two pairs of Columbia Thongs myself.  This pair was a present for my mother.  She really loves them and would wear them all the time if she could.  The price was great!  Ordering was easy
These are verry comfortable and stylish. These are cool. The reason i gave them 4 stars is that when you are wet you can see right throuh them

very comfortable with an adjustable strap at the heel to customize the fit.  i contacted the company first because of the color not showing properly on the website.  they responded quickly.  i tried these on previously at a store and couldn't pass up this deal.  i haven't had a chance to wear them in water yet but i love them more than the regular sneakers i've had
Sorry I am just getting to the review of this itme(of which I have had for a while!) Great Item, it arrived in excellent condition! Great price, speedy delivery! Thanks! Very pleased with Item
The quality of the product is good.. i would always order a  1 or 2 waist sizes larger than regular pants size !!
The socks were a gift for a friend. They really enjoy the comfort and cozy feeling of the plush socks. They are a great buy

I bought these shoes a while back, and I wear them for everyday, work (on occasion) or just whenever I'm out shopping.  They're easy to get on and off, no hassle, just a straight-up shoe made for anyone.  I'm glad I bought them and plan to take them to college this year

I ordered this robe for my son on Monday, the day he was to be released from the hospital following surgery.  To my surprise, it was delivered the next day, beautifully packaged and accompanied by a hand-written thank you note.  The quality and workmanship of the robe are outstanding, and having the terrycloth on the inside works well under the circumstances, as does the lighter weight.  It is a substantial robe, but not as heavy as velour, for instance.  I laundered the robe before giving it to my son, and it came out of the dryer looking as perfect as when it went in - not a thread out of place and no distortion.I'm very pleased with the product, the value, and the service, and look forward to becoming a return customer.  Oh, yes...my son loves the robe, too

The one thing I can say is that the shoe squeeks each step I take.  That gets a bit annoying.  My sister bought these shoes in a department store for probably near double what I did and her's do not squeek.  I don't know if it's possible to get lesser quality with the price you may on Amazon but I wonder.  Once I get past the squeek, I love them.  They came quite fast as well, five stars on that department

great bra, runs big in  the cups....I am small in the back, but, this, the cups not for me anywayHad to return mine, even though I did try it on in a hurry, purchased the bra, and had to return both...I am a 36 DD, very nice, cups run big.  I am a 36 DD in all bras, this one, not to good.....Fav bras, Bali new "comfort bra" awesome, Bali "t back bra", Gap," full coverage lace", and my very fav. "Champion everday bra", wonderful, perfect fitting in each styleSo beware...

I was very excited by all of the write-ups of this product.  I ordered one thinking that if it was as advertised, I would order many more. I regret ordering the one I did.  After the first "hand wash" the underwires popped right through the area that holds them in.  The support is minimal as well.  I was very disappointed with the quality all together and if I could have returned it, I would have

I got tired of renting tuxedos, but at the same time I knew I wouldn't be wearing one much more than once a year.  This is perfect for that type of person.  This won't rate the quality of a $500 set-up, but then you have to ask yourself if a once in a while wear is worth spending the bucks.  In the long run this is a better deal than renting.  Notice they mis-spelled "luxury" in the title, and that should give you some idea of the minor, but not noticeable corners that were cut

When I ordered the product, it was mistakenly advertised as 100% Wool.  A gentleman from the vendor contacted me immediately to inform me that it is not 100% Wool.  He offered, and provided a refund.  While I did not eventually purchase the product, I do appreciate the excellent customer service.  I would consider buying from them in the future.  Also, it appears that they have since corrected the advertisement
I am currently in Germany and I carry my currency converter in my purse. I think it is very convenient and useful for travelers. I can quickly convert Euros to Dollars with my currency converter

I got about 6 pairs of Gold Toe socks.  They're the most comfortable socks I've worn in a long time.  You don't even feel like you have socks on.  They fit well and are made well.  If your hesitating, no need.  I'm not sorry I bought them
I bought this for my daughters 1st birthday. She loves to put her little play makeup in it and carries it everywhare. Hopefully she can keep it in nice shape so she can use it as a teen
My purchase of these slips was a few years back. They have held up nicely. Material is still soft and silky. Survived many washings and stull performs well

My daughter loves these shoes.  They are well made and a great price !  I compared these to the only local shoe store, Payless, that carries tap shoes.  And these are much nicer, and cheaper.  My daughter said these were more comfortable !  There sizing was right on ! When my daughter outgrows this pair, I'd definitely buy these same shoes..... Happy Dancing.. Happy feet

I bought this cologne for my boyfriend (now fiance). I first tested it out using a tester at the cologne counter at a high-end department store. I had never used any Burberry products before, yet I was not disappointed. This product is perfect for any man that wants to smell like a man, this product does not disappoint at all in that it does *NOT* smell at all like a woman's perfume. It is *ALL* man. It is also not overpowering. I don't know about the ladies out there, but I hate it when my man wears overpowering cologne that takes my breath away. This product gives just the right amount of manly exuberance to make you pull your man closer. Definitely recommended

Although it took a while to get this case (a couple of weeks - and no free shipping, of course, since it didn't come directly from Amazon), I have to say, I don't mind - it's a great little case.  I do wish it had the option for a belt hook, but otherwise, it protects my green mini and looks very stylish.  There's an opening for the clickwheel, and the screen is protected by a plastic layer.  The top of the case has a space for the headphone jack as well.Unlike other reviewers who are basing their review on fulfillment of their order, and not the product itself, I can tell you that this is a great little case - it's just as cute as it looks, and does exactly what it's supposed to do.  I would give it 5 stars if if were less expensive, but it seems like all the iPod accessories are more expensive than they should be..

I am happy with this choice. it matches my green mini so well. i do have to say that the cut out for the wheel is a little off, but everything works just fine. i like the cute cut out for the headphones. it also closes with magnets at the bottom. which is nice, you can access it very easily.

Went to a fashion show and after party in Ft. Lauderdale/Miami, and got raves! I almost never wear heels, only when I must at parties and such! They were as comfortable as heels can get and ,of course, very stylish! If you can't afford this seasons "IT" Christian Louboutin's (like me :P), this is a wonderful alternative

by myself...Bought this for myself, after returning a microfiber one at Macy's that was given as a gift.. Most of us like plush and soft. After a tough day its nice to shower and wrap yourself in warmth, comfort, and security..The atmosphere of innocence and contentment, the time before we were aware of the complexities of life...This robe can lead you on your journey to that state...Buy it..Don't hesitate..Its GREAT...Its long enough, big enough, sleeve length is good, color is good, and price is perfect..And, trust me, you won't find anything softer

I received this bathrobe for my birthday last year. (I had placed it on my wishlist.) Warm and absorbent, the robe's soft cotton cuddles a wet, showered body. Its touch is sensuous.So why only four stars? I washed it. The softness remains, but its out-of-the-box appearance is diminished through (minor) pilling. Heavier, more absorbent robes can be bought for not much more money, but those are not this soft

Had this for about 6 months.  Soft, luxurious.  Only problem is that with it's large amount of fluffy cotton, it likes to shed a bit.  And will shrink in the dryer if dried on high heat.Far and away the softest robe you will ever buy.  Puts every other robe to shame

My daughter got this set for Easter last year and just adores it, esp. the umbrella which she uses any possible time she can.  I wouldn't say it's cheaply made but it's just not as well made as the raincoat.  The little "button" on top to finish popped off within a month and can't really be glued back on.  It doesn't affect the umbrella's use but it's just one of those annoying things
Works great for postpartum. I have rated this product 4 stars because it won't fit if you are plus size. No use buying it unless you are NOT in the plus size category
My wife is using  Post Delivery Girdle Belt - Maternity Belt - Post Natal and she likes it

I purchased this for my post-partum recovery.  (I'm still pregnant) I think it will help, but it looks a little cheap. This one is very wide so it should help tighten up all the skin around the abdomen and sides. Target sells a Medella brand maternity belt that looks like it will hold up for a longer period of wear than this one.  But the Medella one is only about 6 inches wide, so it looks like it doesn't tighten everything that has stretched.  I still can't wait to use this belt after I delivery to see if it helps with my recovery.

These shoes have a really good feel.  The bottoms are perfectly made and they last pretty long.  If you are looking for an old school feel with new school comfort, then buy these.  They are not like the huge puffy shoes that you see, and they are not like wearing converse....they are right in the middle.  I would highly recomend these shoes to anyone who skates.

This cream was a lifesaver for me.  A friend of mine recommended it while I was still pregnant, so I bought some before my son was born and took it with me to the hospital.  This cream was what got me through the first 2 weeks (the most crucial time) of breastfeeding.  My nipples were so sore, but this cream really helped and I didn't have to worry about washing it off before my son nursed.  The more I used it the better I felt, it is a MUST for new moms who are planning on nursing

I went through every brand of running shoes .  I am tall and have a large frame and I tend to go through running shoes rather quickly.  When I discovered Brooks about 4 years ago it was Heaven sent.  Yes these shoes are expensive compared to others but you get your moneys' worth and hey spend money are your feet! We abuse them everyday.  They suppport my whole foot and I have not lost any toenails as with others.  I now run for fitness and not races.  These shoes last me about 6 months.  So if you are in searching mode I HIGHLY recommend these shoes.

You may not have heard of them, but Brooks makes some of the best, most popular running and walking shoes that you can buy.  I was instroduced to the brand a few years ago while working in an Amazon warehouse where I walked 10-20 miles per day picking customer orders.  I haven't purchased another brand of walking / running shoe since then.  The Brooks Beast Running shoe provides the best support of any shoe on the market.  I have flat feet with no arch support, which makes it more difficult to walk on hard surfaces for long periods of time.  This shoe makes the task so much easier.  Honestly, it's the best, most comfortable shoe that I've ever owned -- AND it has a fresh, hip design that those of us in the MTV generation can wear with pride
I have worn Asics GEl-DS Trainers for many years and they have consistently been a good choice for me giving me the stability I need in a running sneaker without the added weight.

well first of all thank you for sending them to me. i'm in Iraq, and i do lots of running, these shoes feel so good on my feet. i've invited all  of the soldier in my unit to log on and try these shoes again thank you in a year i know i will buy at least 3 more pair. MS ESTELLA ABDULLAH USA ARMY..

The PJs by Carole were an excellent choice. I had checked around for PJs that were light-weight flannel and attractive at the same time. The two sets of PJs from Carole fit the bill entirely. I've been using them every night since they arrived. And they can be thrown in the washer and dryer and still look and feel great. They are the most comfortable PJs I have ever owned.

I love this dress! It is so pretty and light weight, perfect for summer. The seam edges were turned under then sewn. Such a small detail but so important. This was so much more than I expected and the price..you just can't beat it
shirt came almost immediatley. was very happy it fit and is very comfortable - very satisfied customer and will order more real soon
This sandal is quite comfortable and easy to put on for little ones. My six year old seems very content when he can just run and slip them on.

I've tried Johnston-Murphy, Rockport, and Cole Hahn in trying to find the perfect shoe.  I have chronic back trouble so I'm finicky about my shoes.  The JMs and the CHs started falling apart within 3 or 4 months.  I've had a pair of these for a year and a half and they're like new.  I've already bought a second pair.  I'll never wear any other brand

this little ballet flat is great.  it doesn't offer all the support in the world, but it is very comfortable, adorable, and will go with anything.  i don't think i'll need the help of bandaids with these!  i'd get them in more colors if they were available.  totally recommend them
Very comfortable shoe.  True to size.  Order was received very quickly and I was very satisfied.  Wish they would have had my size in black as well.

this dress and company are HORRIBLE. the material is ridiculously cheap and see through. i returned the dress and the company said they would refund my money immediately. i sent the dress back and a month went by before i called HotFash. they told me they refunded my money and they NEVER had. i was on the phone for over an hour with amazon and with hotfash to get my refund. it was a nightmare.

These are excellent boxing shoes.  I bought them for remedial purposes.  Turns out, like all boxing shoes, they have no heels.  And the heels were what I needed, as well as the high tops.  So I had to return them - which was done with no problem.  Thank yo
My husband likes his slippers although they did turn his socks orange at first.  I think that got better the more he wore them

I just bought these tights so I could start running in very cold temperatures (10-20 degrees, sometimes subzero).  These pants do an amazing job of keeping me warm on my run.  They are somewhat thick to keep you warm but they do not weigh you down or restrict movement.  They are designed to wick away moisture but my legs do not sweat much so I cannot comment on that feature.  They are also very tight and I believe they are meant to be layered underneath a pair of warm-up pants.  (At least, that's what I do.)  I am 5'3" and the legs are a little long; they are probably ideal for someone between 5'5" to 5'8".
Nice shoes.  My son, age 3, has flat feet and since he has started wearing these shoes at the advice of my pediatrician he has stopped complaining of his feet hurting

My son wears shoes out fairly quickly and these are holding up well to all an almost 3 year old can dish out.  The velcro also makes it possible for him to dress himself, which he likes, and provides a good fit

Finally, we found a source to get legwarmers for our six year-old. They come in various lengths and colors too. Had to have Navy blue for school uniform compliance. Thanks to Amazon, our little girl's legs won't freeze this winter

This is a very comfortable sleeping bra to wear at night.  The only problem with this bra is that you need 2 hands and the lights on to snap it back up after nursing.  Forget about fumbling around in the dark while holding the baby!  It won't work.  I do love the snug fit and the soft cotton, though, and it was the perfect bra to wear before the baby came

extremely comfortable! but difficult to open and close with just one hand (this is the only reason it didn't get 5 stars).it is the best thing for the early weeks when you are sore and uncomfortable - excellent to sleep in.i am recommending this one to all my friends

I had been searching for socks I could wear with my jeans and replace the old athletic socks I was always wearing.  These are the most comfortable socks I've ever owned!  It's like wearing slippers!  I think these socks are spoiling me to the point where all socks will now be compared against these.  I'm afraid I'm becoming a sock connoisseur

I love these pants; they're about all I wear to go birdwatching now. I have two orange pairs and one yellow one. Anyway, the pants are wicked bad, especially with the new flip flops I got at the drugstore yesterday. I don't wear shirts except at restaurants and places of businesses that require them, so usually I'm pants and flops and that's all baby. It's a great ensamble and I would highly recommend getting at least seventeen pairs for your whole soccer team! Oh that and a penguin clock, everyone's gotta have one of those. But I'm really into birds so maybe it's just me
I bought these for my son when he outgrew his size 2T, and he loves them! They keep him warm at night, which helps with my piece of mind! Would recommend

I was looking for warm fuzzy pj's for my son, and that is exactly what I got, and it came in a timely manner. I do believe that you can buy these exact same pj's at target without the shipping cost though.
I got exactly what I ordered, in good condition and pretty fast considering it was December!  Thanks for a great way to shop

I am selective about the pantyhose I wear and I have been disappointed for various reasons in some of the pantyhose I have bought over the years. Hue styles in Lacy Sheer to Waist pantyhose, Age Defiance control pantyhose and Clear Control pantyhose all deserve 5 star ratings from me. These pantyhose are also relatively inexpensive. I bought this style pantyhose in tan and I like very much how it looks on my legs and thighs when wearing a dress or skirt.    While in recent years I often need, for the sake of an appearance, to wear control top pantyhose, this style is among the most comfortable and nice looking sheer to waist pantyhose I have worn. I highly recommend Lacy Sheer to Waist pantyhose to all persons who sometimes or often want to wear sheer to waist pantyhose to go with their mini-dresses and mini-skirts.

I am on my third pair of santiossages. I am a woman who wears them even though they are mens and I love them. I live in them from about april through late september (in New England). They are the most comfortable shoes and last a long time

I would say out of the few colours the white colour is the best, as the rubber molding for the white one seem to be different than all the colour ones. I can tell the white colour is better produced. Not sure is it due to different batch of stock

I am very pleased with the Warner bras. I have worn Warner bras for many years and was distressed not to find them in the Department stores where I shop. But I did find them on line which was terrific

these sunglasses were way better than i had expected them to be. i love them. they`re just like nicole`s. =

I'm an Old Corp Marine and need a pair of jungle boots to replace my old ones. The new boots they have in the military didn't suit me and was happy to see these boots at a really good rate. I couldn't find one my size and order them through Amazon. They arrived by UPS and after breaking them in they work just fine.

I purchased this set for my husband. It is very nice looking, and we are happy with it.  On the downside, the arms on the sweatshirt are on the short side (he is 6'1",has to push the sleeves up to look OK), and the neck is a bit tight with the hood pulling it back.  I figure to stretch the neck after it is washed. And I agree with another reviewer that it is sized a bit small.  I ordered an XL, which is usually quite roomy on my husband, but this has no extra room--I will never be able to put it in the dryer.  If I were ordering again, I would order the XXL.  I hope this will be helpful

I've never owned silk underwear before but I liked the look of  these - I wanted something red, sexy, and brief - that's what I got. great fit, feel great. Would really like to get in touch with Ryan Eckenrode..

I already knew it would be a pretty bad idea to buy a wig online but i didn't expect they would pack it up as badly as they did. It was totally mangled and mashed when I got it. They get four stars though because the wig itself is amazingly good once you restyle it yourself. Though I'm still having trouble with the spikes at the back of the hair
I bought these sunglasses for my husband for Christmas.  They fit him well and look good.  I wish they came with a sturdier carrying case rather than the cloth bag

The purse is great, I love the color and size.  It's not the best quality, though. The inside pocket zipper broke within the first week of owning it and the front seams had threads falling out for about a month. If those tiny details never happened, this would be a perfect purse

These are a few dollars more than the socks I can get locally that say they are the same fabric.  When I got these ones I wa. The thing that I like about it though is that it is super comfy, it separates and does not have underwire or any tricky clasps to deal with (a bonus for when you've got your hands full with a baby). Great to wear during the day or at night.  Highly recomend!
Most comfortable slippers in the world -- which is why we purchased this second pair for the privacy of the office!Also great service and delivery of the product

I am quite happy with the purchase, it fits well and what can I say I am very happy with the purchase. Although I am not sure if there were other colors beside black but the long of the short if you are lookng for 'Gauchos' this is great. I would get another one for sure if I had the $$$!! :O

I'm very particular about the feel of a material, especially my sleepwear, and this product if perfect. Its very comfortable, and the material is breathable which is what I like. I do however think that the length could've been a little shorter, but that's a choice thing I guess

I finally found the shoe I wanted; it had the strappy straps, great heel support, not too high, and just right crystal decoration. I loved these shoes! They were comfortable and I didnt even break them in. I was very happy with this purchase. The grass stains wipped off very easily (I had it done the very next day using a warm damp cloth). I love shoes and I ll wear beautiful ones even if they hurt but honestly I wore these all night and didnt want take them off. Because they had the right the support I felt confident walking in them and the straps were just the right amount of sexy
I usually go through dress shoes like paper but so far these seem to bee holding up to 6 day 10 hr work weeks quite well. Good quality good price.

These shorts are perfect for the woman who needs a little extra give in the waist, but cannot go the next size up without sacrificing a good fit in the rear.  They wash and dry beautifully. The hidden elastic in the waist does not bunch the fabric -- you cannot tell by looking at the shorts that there is elastic there at all.  But you can sure tell it by how comfortable you feel.
Nice and cool jacket with very comfortable fabric..... I really love this jacket because it reminds me the day of Champion!

These boots are really great and colorful. When I wore them to the drs. office it was raining hard outside. The dr. came into where I was and commented that he really liked my boots and wasn't I afraid that the rain would ruin them. When I told him they were rain boots he was really surprised. Everyone who sees them comment on how cool they look. They can't believe they are rain boots. They are very comfortable to wear.

I just bought the shoes last week. They've slogged through rain, snow, hail, and sleet. (No I don't work for the post office). They stay beautifully dry, are comfortable, and have great traction. I'm very happy--and I like their look too
I ordered the camel color and I love these boots!  They are comfortable and look very attractive with pants or a skirt!  I got them at a really nice discount too when ordering through Amazon!  Thanks

I purchased the women's easton western boot in three colors, camel, brown and black, and the camel boot is the only one that does not bleed dye from the boot, onto my leg and into the pants I am wearing. It is unfortunate as the boot fits well and is attractive

I have just about every pair of merrell sandals they make. This by far is my favorite. And considering how comfortable the others are that is saying something. They are AMAZING! You will never take them off

I've always had a love/hate relationship with my sandals.  Love them when I first set eyes on the "must have" shoe, hate them when my feet are suffering from breaking them in.  I bought these sandals for a vacation that had a lot of walking involved.  From the first day I wore them they conformed perfectly to my feet.  I did an amazing amount of walking in them the first day and not one blister!  These sandals formed around my feet as if they were already broken in.  So basically i did not have to do it!  I highly recommend these sandals as a must have for any women's closet.
Very satified with purchase.  It was exactly as stated and of good quality.  Search was easy to understand and ordering was a breeze

This is a sharp pair of demi-boots. The wedge heel is just the right height to wear all day. I think they run a half size large, so the size 7 ( my regular size) slipped a bit at the heel. Wearing a heavy pair of socks with them helped immensely. I really like this pair and will wear them often

As a petite person I've had quite a problem finding a 32A strapless bustier bra to wear with my wedding dress and with a bridesmaid dress for another wedding.  This bra fit perfectly and is quite comfortable.  Shipping was very fast (less than a week) and product was well packaged

There are several features I like about this product.  Most importantly, the bra supports and yet has smooth lines under silky clothes and the front dips below the waist so you don't have that sausage roll effect where the abdomen bulges when the bra stops.  Another plus is that it comes with clear straps you can use for extra support.  I only have 2 negatives.  First, I believe the ad said it came with both clear AND straps to match the bra but when it arrived only clear was included.  (I didn't pursue this.)  However, the biggest negative is that the cups are not just lined but padded.  I personally find that makes the bra less useful and can even disturb the lines of some clothing.  Sometimes less IS more
I use these gloves for photographic work (handling processed film) but they could be used for military dress purposes also.  They are very good qulaity
There were and are very cute Booties and I needed to return them for a different size it was quick and easy. Very nice to deal with.Would recommend
Good quality shirt, affordable price and delivered in a timely manner. Pleased with the product and so is my grandson

I think this dress is fabulous.  Its great support means I don't have to wear an uncomfortable nursing bra to bed anymore (I'm now a 38D, fitting into a medium).  Comfortable and cut to allow for a post-pregnancy belly.  My husband calls it "sexy," and I feel great in it.  That's something I can't say about much of what I wear lately.  I highly recommend this dress for lounging and nightwear.  I might even get another one to wear out

This shirt is a lightweight jacket but warm. I bought it as a gift for my dad that worked in areas without heat. he found it very useful and comfortable, and plus he did not have to wear his heavy coat to work

I discovered Dorfman Pacific ball caps about five years ago when I bought a great American flag logoed cap in Chatham, Mass., in a high-end men's clothing store. I have tried to contact the company to purchase more hats, but apparently they sell only to retail distributors, not individual customers. I wear baseball caps often and these fit perfectly. The brim is strong and the hat doesn't ride high on your head. If you care about how caps look and feel, I would strongly suggest purchasing a Dorfman ball cap

We love Stride Rites for our boys because of the quality, fit and comfort.  I bought this particular model because of the sale price.  I wasn't sure how well these would stay on because there is just one thin strap and less velcro compared to other models.  They fit very securely, however, and were quite good looking--better than my impression from the photo.  My son loved them and wore them daily.  They were still holding up well when he grew out of them.  I am ordering another pair in the next size up.

I usually buy my daughter Stride Rite shoes and she loves wearing them. These were no different. As soon as I got them she wanted to put them on right away and they are her favorite shoes.  Stride Rite is one of the few shoes that are made in wide sizes.  Amazon also delivered the shoes amazingly fast and during the holiday season, thanks Amazon

I wear a size medium, but I bought a large based on the previous reviewer's experience.  It fit perfectly, not loose and not too tight.  The collar is effective and comfortable as well.It gives sun protection but also protection from rocks and coral when you're snorkeling.  There's a convenient loop on the bottom front where I attached my u-water camera, too.  I did stain it with some greasy food during my two weeks in Hawaii, but it came right out later when washed in cold water.I couldn't be more pleased with this rashguard.  I'll use it anytime I'm in the sun and water for any length of time.  It was shipped from Oahu, so I might have saved the shipping cost by buying it on the island when I arrived
hese were the best Hurricane's yet. the grid 8 are nothing compared to thees. I used mine for a full season of adventure racng and triathlons, and still use them to walk around and work in
Spikes are great for jumping!But for sure order half a size or one size bigger! These shoes overall are really good! Just dont let anyone spike the top of the shoe... it leaves a hole
I found the product to be all the promotion said it would be.  The leather is nice and it holds and displays all my various credit-card-sized cards nicely.  Good product

This was a great company to deal with . They kept me informed about my order from the time they received it to the day it was shipped. The pants are very light weight and soft my husband loved them. Donn

I was born and raised in a tropical climate, so when it gets cold up here in the northeast I really feel it.  These ear muffs have surpassed my expectations in terms of warmth. I'll never have to experience frozen ears again!  They look quite stylish as well.  The texture of the sheepskin appears to be much more even than what is shown in the picture.  My only gripe is that the band is not covered with material, as depicted here.  If you don't mind that, I highly recommend this item

I bought Thorlo socks after a trip to Disney World. In spite of wearing cotton socks and well-broken-in sneakers, I developed really painful blisters on both feet. The trip was ruined. I read about these socks on line and decided to try them on my next vacation. They are really comfortable and I haven't had blisters again, even when on vacations that involve lots of walking. I use them all the time now, not just while on vacation. They may be a little pricey, but I think they're worth every penny
I bought these boots for my son at Christmas.  He was very satisfied with them.  They look great and he has worn them almost daily.  I would purchase this item again and recommend it to others.

I have had these boots for a few months now, and I absolutely LOVE them!!!  They are so warm, luxuriously soft, and the removeable inserts insure a perfect fit.  I've also had a pair of the short popular sheepskin boots (you know, the ones that start with a U) for about a year now; I have enjoyed them too, but I wanted to purchase a tall pair.  However, I think everyone else did too, because they were nearly impossible to find.  The Warmbats are very similar to the "other" brand, except the shape is a little bit less clunky and they have a very cool design on the back of the boot.  I have to say, I actually like these better!!!  They are of equal or better quality, and you get much more for your money (they came with another pair of inserts and a bottle of sheepskin cleaner)!!!  I'm very impressed with these boots, and I'm glad Amazon recommended them.  If you're tired of waiting for your size in the "other" boots try Warmbats, they definitely won me over!!!
I love these boots. They're warm and comfortable, and at the price cannot be beat. I'm rating them a "4", because they're my first sheepskin boots, and there might be some better out there
I have 2 pairs of Warmbats and they are very, very comfortable! They're  better than Uggs, for sure. They keep your feet warm and very comfortable -- definitely worth the buy
case fits the player well, just wish it had a lil stand on the back so I can prop up the player and watch video
I love these shoes. Steve Madden had a pair that I was eyeing exactly like this but, they are about $50 more. Definately a good buy for the money. The inside has a nice cushion and is very comfy.

When I first got these shoes in the mail and put them on my 1 year old and heard them for the first time I thought that I was going to return them immediately because they annoyed the heck out of me!  That day happened to be my childs first birthday party so I decided to keep them on him for the day and return them later...first I have to say that he has never laughed so much before that what he would when he would walk in them and hear them squeak-he LOVED them!  Second, EVERYONE at his birthday party (and we have a big family and church family too) LOVED them-all of the other mothers wanted to know where I got them and how they could buy their kid some!  Admittedly they are incredibly cute (I bought the USA Red ones, and my child DOES seem to love them...plus I always know where he's at! Needles to say, after that day I decided to keep them and now they've grown on me though I wouldn't recommend them if you or your child can't tolerate constant noise because these suckers squeak every time your child MOVES

The shoes came in perfect condition and I am very satisfied.  The only thing that disturbed me is I purchased the same shoes in black and white  online from Bealls for $29.00 and I paid $48.75 for the pink ones

I love these shoes.  I have 3 pair and now I'm going for a fourth!  Very comfortable and cute.  My feet are very sensitive and I usually get blisters, etc., but these shoes have never given me a problem.  I can wear them with socks or without and they are extremely comfortable; no rubbing, pinching, etc.  I'd give them a rating of 10 stars if that were an option

I'd highly recommend this shoe style to anyone who desires comfort. I now have four pairs in different colors since they are great for work, weekends, and whenever you want something that just feels comfortable

i ordered this wallet for a christmas gift.  i was very happy when i first looked it over.  the lining is throughout the whole wallet, no nook and cranny unturned.  the leather is soft and a beautiful color.  the gift was for a young man (26 years old, new yorker) with a unique yet classic style. he really loved it.  however the downside was its SIZE.  it is ulta thin but very wide.  i recommend wearing it in a jacket pocket.

I just recently got this wallet, and I just love it.  Very stylish, yet functional.  Looks great, and no one I know owns a wallet that looks like it.  The coin compartment is a big plus, because I don't like having loose change jangling around in my pocket.  The price is pretty good too; I've seen comparable items (leather wallets handmade in Italy) at department stores for a helluva lot more

These are the only jeans that fit my figure and I love the long length, too! I've tried every single brand of mid-priced jeans and I was so happy when they fit. Unlike most jeans that I've tried on, these don't gape too much in the back. The sizes run big so try on a size or two smaller than you normally wear. I would say these jeans are good for women who: A) are tall, B) have an above-average hip-waist ratio, C) have a booty, and D) like stretch and comfort
I purchased this shirt for my husband for Christmas and he loves it. Great quality material and just overall nice shirt. Would recommend to anyone and would reorder from this company again.
I really love the ankle bracelet. I gave it as a gift and everyone who saw it thinks it's beautiful. Great craftsmanship

This bag is much larger than expected.  It is very spacious with two interior zip pockets (one on each side). The bag smells of fabulous genuine leather every time you unzip it.  The handbag came with an authentication card and a dust bag for storage.
It's a beautiful bag but, I purchased it for  daytime thinking it was red canvas.  It's red Leather Suede with Navy Blue straps (I thought they would be black
They are cushy, comfortable, and they don't slide on your foot.  The soles are grippy and great for walking outside.  My wife surprised me with these Packer slippers - I love em'

I was pleased to find an extended size belt at a reasonable price through Amazon.com. My husband has a hard time finding belts his size that are simple and go with everything. Although I wouldn't expect the quality to last a lifetime, for the price I was pleased with the product. The price of the belt and the shipping fit easily into my budget and I highly recommend this product and will very likely purchase another belt in the future.

I had ordered these for my husband but in my haste ordered the wrong size -so they became mine and I'm glad for the goof-up on my part! These are excellent!!!! so warm with lots of cushion...I have sensitive feet and I'm always looking for socks with extra cushion on the heel and soles, so this was a happy accident that I ended up with these...of course I had to come back to order the correct size for hubby :-)

These arrived on the same day as my Nike Airmax shoes - never thought a thing about the socks - thought the Nikes were the most comfortable shoes I have ever had. Then I wore the socks with some uncomfortable boating sandals - they too felt the most comfortable ever! This has happened with all my shoes.It is astonishing, to me, that socks can have such a wonderful effect. A luxurious feel. I can recomend them
Overall great shirt. Sizes fit right. Looks great. Looks good for Night Life or a day at the office
i m very impressed by what i received from the amazon for the good and honset service they did for me. i will be a permenant custmor for the amazon

I've been a runner for about 15 years now and I've tried just about every brand of running shoe there is.  The Asics Gel Nimbus is my absolute most favorite of them all!!!  They have amazing cushion and bounce.  I will NEVER buy another shoe again.
Actually, in error, I ordered a size too small and could not wear them. Did try exchanging them for my size but they did not have the shoes available in that.  So actually I never got to enjoy them
This is my second pair of Asics Nimbus shoes, and I love them.  I bought them because they are supposed to be good for people who underpronate (have high arches)

Hurry and buy these while they are under $50. I wear Birkenstock clogs and sandals most days. My foot is also rather wide and these fit well with a light sock. If you run a medium to narrow width you could wear a thicker sock and be fine. The shipping from Midwest was super fast as well; only 2 days!

If you have never tried Birkenstocks I would highly recommennd them. After being a waitress for 25 years you can immagine the problems I had with my feet. I bought my first pair of Birkenstocks on the recomendation from my daughter-in-law, well after that I was hooked. I now own 15 pairs, have not worn any other kind of shoes for 7 years. Am I happy, you bet, and so are my feet. Birkenstocks are better than going barefoot
I purchased recently ASICS Men's GT-2100 and i have to say i am very satisfied with this product. i really enjoy it every time i go to the gym. I can only recommend to people to use this product
I've been running in Asics shoes for more than 10 years.  The GT series continues to provide good fit and comfort
The GT-2100 shoes are the best running shoes that I have ever used.The fit, cushioning and quality are the best.  My only regret is thatthe GT-2100 is no longer available

These shoes offer great support, and cushion for tired, aching feet. I purchased these shoes for my bad knees and back and love the relief I get. I highly recommend them to anyone needing that little bit of extra support

After Reading and trying this is best .. I've just got new one now they can be found good price.. I go to gym and this shoes are very good..I don't really feel any jump and shock while running or working out.. wonderful techonology..I highly recommand it..

The GT-2100 from Asics is a phenomenal shoe. It provides the best support of any stability shoe around, and has been voted the best running shoe in the World by Runner's World. Though not made for heavy over-pronaters, this is a fantastic shoe for those who do not or just slightly over-pronate. It also provides fantastic supposrt for those with weaker ankles or knees. An all-around fantastic piece of equipment

I weigh in at around 200 lbs. and tend to pronate.  I run frequently at medium distance (2-5 miles a day) and this shoe has been by far the best I've owned.  Only drawback was initial stiffness of shoe, but this subsided quickly (after breaking in)

The L.B. Evans men's deer slippers I ordered as a Christmas gift arrived in a remarkable three days! The recipient found them both comfortable and luxurious, remarking that they looked nice enough to wear to town

This is the padded panty to buy!  It truly does look "natural", even under light-weight fitted pants or drapey pants.  You will not detect the padding outline like some other padded panties.  The material is durable and well stitched.  The fit is firm and fabulous.  The only downside that I could find with this garment, is that the rise is a bit high (the waist band hits at the natural waist), making this panty not very useful under low rise pants
I liked this bra for a while, it had nice shape and support, but after a while the underwire broke through which didn't feel too good.  I did like it while it lasted, it was cuter than most

Although the shipping was more than the item they are reliable Thigh Highs. They feel great and not scratchy and they look great. One size does fit all (or most people up to 190 lbs i think it says). I couldve went to a lingerie store for these at a cheaper price

I enjoy my sandals very much. They did hurt my feet because I wore them on vacation. I can't really blame it on the sandals because we did alot of walking. I really think they are great and they came in the mail very quickly, in time for my vacation!!

I don't like thong sandals but these sandals don't feel like there is anything between my toes.  I was very surprised how comfortable they were right out of the box and the more I wear them the more comfortable they get
